name: couch-and-recline
description: 2-COM has a new client, Couch & Recline, who specializes in furniture sales. They have been in the furniture business for over 30 years. However, in the past 5 years, CEO Dustin Roiland has noticed a sharp decline in furniture sales. Couch & Recline's marketing research concluded that this is the result of their weak web presence. Dustin Roiland has asked 2-COM to design and develop a marketing site.
author: Adedotun Olusoga <adedotun.olusoga@gmail.com>
